mapper.sql: id, name, platform, account, config_type, search_keywords, comment_content, daily_limit, start_time, sort_order, skip_repeat, status, create_by, create_time
mapper.select:
SELECT ec.account as account, ec.platform as platform, COALESCE(SUM(e.exposure_count), 0) as exposureCount, MAX(e.exposure_time) as lastExposureTime, COALESCE(MAX(e.create_time), ec.create_time) as createTime FROM exposure_config ec LEFT JOIN exposure_event e ON ec.id = e.config_id
AND ec.platform = #{platform} AND ec.account LIKE CONCAT('%', #{account}, '%')
GROUP BY ec.id, ec.account, ec.platform, ec.create_time ORDER BY lastExposureTime DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exposure_config (name, platform, account, config_type, search_keywords, comment_content, daily_limit, start_time, sort_order, skip_repeat, status, create_by, create_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{platform}, #{account}, #{configType}, #{searchKeywords}, #{commentContent}, #{dailyLimit}, #{startTime}, #{sortOrder}, #{skipRepeat}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{createTime})
